item.title: 明治安田生命保险称将尽量减少日本债券购买量
item.description: 明治安田生命保险株式会社认为，日本长期国债的收益率还有进一步上升的空间，因此将暂时保持最低限度的购买量。【原文：Meiji Yasuda Life Insurance Co. sees room for yields on long-maturity Japanese government bonds to rise further and will keep purchases of the securities to a minimum for the time being.】

item.title: 债券交易员对美联储加快减息步伐投入新的赌注
item.description: 随着国债反弹，债券交易员们再次倾向于鸽派，纷纷押注将从美联储加快降息步伐中获益。【原文：Bond traders are tilting dovish again, piling into wagers that would benefit from a faster pace of Federal Reserve interest rate cuts as Treasuries rally.】

item.title: 萨默斯认为美国长期国债收益率将长期走高
item.description: 美国前财政部长劳伦斯-萨默斯（Lawrence Summers）表示，随着时间的推移，他认为长期利率会越来越高。【原文：Former US Treasury Secretary Lawrence Summers said he sees higher long-term interest rates over time.】

item.title: 塞内加尔发行 7.5 亿美元欧洲债券，市场不确定性有所缓解
item.description: 塞内加尔成为今年第四个利用该市场的撒哈拉以南非洲国家，其债券销售表明投资者对其新政府越来越有信心。【原文：Senegal became the fourth sub-Saharan African nation to tap the market this year, with a bond sale that shows investors are gaining confidence in its new government.】

item.title: 所罗门合伙人公司聘用威廉-布莱尔银行家索兰吉-贝拉斯克斯
item.description: 根据一份声明，Natixis 支持的精品投资银行 Solomon Partners 已聘请 Solange Velazquez 担任芝加哥的董事总经理。【原文：Solomon Partners, the boutique investment bank backed by Natixis, has hired Solange Velazquez to be a managing director in Chicago, according to a statement.】

item.title: 路易斯安那州枪支法案有可能扰乱华尔街的小额贷款业务
item.description: 路易斯安那州不久将禁止 "歧视 "枪支实体的银行参与政府合同，此前立法者提出了与德克萨斯州一项法规类似的立法，该法规对华尔街公司的公共财政工作造成了冲击。【原文：Louisiana could soon bar banks that “discriminate” against firearm entities from working on government contracts, after lawmakers advanced legislation that’s similar to a Texas statute that has whipsawed Wall Street firms’ public-finance work.】

item.title: 地区性银行投资者对轻微阵痛毫无胃口
item.description: 说到商业地产，美国银行业的投资者都心有余悸。【原文：When it comes to commercial real estate, investors in the US banking sector are on edge.】

item.title: 受美国收割压力影响，小麦将创 11 月以来最长跌势
item.description: 小麦期货连续第五个交易日下跌，创下六个多月来的最长连跌记录，原因是美国的收割进度快于分析师的预期。【原文：Wheat futures headed for the fifth straight daily decline — the longest such streak in over six months — as the American harvest progressed more quickly than analysts expected.】

item.title: 埃纳米公司表示，智利锂项目吸引了大量投资者的兴趣
item.description: 智利国营矿业公司埃纳米公司（Enami）表示，作为智利政府努力开发更多世界最大储量的一部分，该公司的一个锂矿项目正受到潜在合作伙伴的广泛关注。【原文：Chilean state mining firm Enami says it’s getting plenty of interest from prospective partners in a lithium project as part of the government’s efforts to tap more of the world’s biggest reserves.】

item.title: 石油算法交易商在欧佩克出人意料后放大原油价格跌幅
item.description: 由于欧佩克+意外表示计划在今年晚些时候向市场恢复部分供应，依赖趋势跟踪算法的石油交易商加剧了本周原油的抛售。【原文：Oil traders that rely on trend-following algorithms compounded a selloff in crude this week as OPEC+ unexpectedly signaled plans to return some supplies to the market later in the year.】

item.title: 红龙虾店主通过实现环境、社会和公司治理目标降低债券票面利率
item.description: Red Lobster Management LLC 旗下的泰国海鲜供应商表示，它已经实现了三项 ESG 目标，从而降低了与可持续发展挂钩的债券利率。【原文：The Thai seafood supplier that owns Red Lobster Management LLC said it has achieved three of its ESG targets, triggering lower interest rates on its sustainability-linked bonds.】

item.title: 欧盟最后期限临近，汉莎航空的 ITA 协议悬而未决
item.description: 德国汉莎航空公司（Deutsche Lufthansa AG）向 ITA 航空公司投资 3.25 亿欧元（3.54 亿美元）的命运岌岌可危，因为欧盟监管机构要求这家德国航空公司做出让步，但该公司并不准备接受。【原文：The fate of Deutsche Lufthansa AG’s €325 million ($354 million) investment into ITA Airways hangs in the balance as European Union regulators push the German airline to make concessions it isn’t prepared to accept.】

item.title: 海上风电行业准备迎接更多动荡—和特朗普
item.description: 这本该是海上风能在美国最终起飞的十年；到 2030 年，海上风能将从近乎停滞的状态发展成为潜在的大规模可再生能源来源。虽然这项绿色技术取得了显著成功，但该行业本身却举步维艰；公司损失了数十亿美元，通货膨胀迫使开发商推迟或放弃大型项目。现在，这个对实现美国气候目标至关重要的行业面临着越来越大的政治风险；唐纳德-克林顿的批评更是凸显了这一点。【原文：This was supposed to be the decade when offshore wind finally took off in the US — going from a near standstill to a potentially massive source of renewable energy by 2030. And while the green technology has had notable successes, the sector itself has struggled; companies have lost billions of dollars, with inflation forcing developers to delay or scrap big projects. Now the industry, which is critical to fulfilling US climate goals, faces mounting political risks — underscored by criticism Don】

item.title: 希腊举行最长海军演习阻止俄罗斯石油输送
item.description: 希腊海军在该国海岸附近的一片水域恢复了演习，有效阻止了俄罗斯利用该水域在油轮之间转运石油的能力。【原文：The Greek Navy resumed drills in an expanse of water just off the country’s coast, effectively blocking Russia’s ability to use the area for the transfer of petroleum between tankers.】

item.title: 墨西哥大选引发的震荡颠覆了以货币为纽带的比索交易
item.description: 在过去的两年里，全球的资金经理们都有一个在墨西哥赚钱的秘诀。在利率低的地方借钱，在墨西哥资产上大做文章，然后随着比索的不断走高而一扫而空。【原文：For the last two years, the world’s money managers had a recipe to mint money in Mexico. Borrow anywhere interest rates were low, pile into Mexican assets — and clean up as the peso marched higher and higher.】

item.title: Bravura 预计将于 2025 年开始津巴布韦锂生产
item.description: 尼日利亚富豪本尼迪克特-彼得斯（Benedict Peters）旗下的布拉乌拉控股有限公司（Bravura Holdings Ltd.- 该公司的一位官员说，尼日利亚大亨本尼迪克特-彼得斯（Benedict Peters）拥有的一家公司计划明年初开始在津巴布韦的一个锂项目上投产。【原文：Bravura Holdings Ltd. – a firm owned by Nigerian tycoon Benedict Peters – plans to start production at a Zimbabwean lithium project early next year, a company official said.】

item.title: 华尔街扫清 T+1 最后一大障碍，交易失败率下降
item.description: 许多人担心上周推出的更快结算制度可能会扰乱全球市场的交易，但华尔街已经通过了这一预期的最后重大考验。【原文：Wall Street has cleared what was expected to be the last major test of the faster settlement regime introduced last week that many feared could disrupt trading across global markets.】

item.title: 米莱吸引资本，石油钻探商阿空加瓜着眼阿根廷上市
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，随着哈维尔-米莱伊总统的改革吸引资本重返阿根廷市场，阿根廷石油钻探公司 Petrolera Aconcagua Energia SA 正寻求通过首次公开募股为扩张融资。【原文：Argentine oil driller Petrolera Aconcagua Energia SA is looking to finance an expansion with an initial public offering as President Javier Milei’s reforms entice capital back to Argentine markets, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德意志银行重聘西蒙-利奥波德为副董事长
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）重新聘用西蒙-利奥波德（Simon Leopold）担任房地产、博彩、住宿和休闲部副主席。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG rehired Simon Leopold as a vice chairman in its real estate, gaming, lodging and leisure group.】

item.title: 土耳其将对股票收益征税作为财政紧缩措施的一部分
item.description: 土耳其正在考虑对股票和加密资产的投资收益征税，作为财政紧缩措施的一部分。【原文：Turkey is considering taxing proceeds from investments in stocks and cryptoassets as part of a fiscal tightening push.】

item.title: 据称阿美石油公司和伍德塞德公司正在商谈投资泰卢固液化天然气厂
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Tellurian 公司正在与沙特阿美石油公司（Saudi Aramco）和伍德赛德能源集团有限公司（Woodside Energy Group Ltd.）就这两家公司投资其位于路易斯安那州的液化天然气出口项目进行讨论。【原文：Tellurian Inc. is in discussions with Saudi Aramco and Woodside Energy Group Ltd. over the two companies investing in its liquefied natural gas export project in Louisiana, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 小联盟棒球洗牌，体育场债券销售回暖
item.description: 上周，随着南卡罗来纳州斯帕坦堡市出售债券，为德克萨斯游骑兵队的低 A 级附属球队 Hub City Spartanburgers 建造一座体育场，美国小联盟棒球的新面貌拉开了帷幕。【原文：The new look of US minor-league baseball took a curtain-call last week as Spartanburg, South Carolina, sold bonds to build a stadium for the Hub City Spartanburgers, a Low-A level affiliate of the Texas Rangers.】

item.title: 希腊航运业巨头称红海可能导致新一轮运价飙升
item.description: 希腊船东埃万杰洛斯-马里纳基斯（Evangelos Marinakis）周二表示，如果胡塞武装在红海的袭击继续造成航运中断，未来几个月集装箱和大宗商品的运价可能会回升。【原文：Container and commodity shipping rates likely will rally in coming months if disruptions continue because of Houthi attacks in the Red Sea, Greek shipowner Evangelos Marinakis said Tuesday.】

item.title: 首次降息在即，交易员期待加元走软
item.description: 交易员们正在为加元的疲软做准备，因为他们押注当地的政策制定者可能会先于美联储的同行们降低利率。【原文：Traders are bracing for weakness in the Canadian dollar amid wagers that local policymakers will likely reduce interest rates before their peers at the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 莫迪的微弱胜利使阿达尼集团股票跌去 450 亿美元，创下单日最差跌幅
item.description: 对于阿达尼帝国的股票来说，纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）的政党在大选中不尽如人意的胜利比卖空者的攻击还要糟糕。【原文：For the Adani empire’s stocks, an underwhelming election win for Narendra Modi’s party is worse than a short-seller attack.】

item.title: 欧洲央行要求部分德国银行增加 CRE 贷款准备金
item.description: 欧洲中央银行不久将推动几家德国贷款机构建立更高的房地产贷款违约准备金，此举将削减它们的利润。【原文：The European Central Bank will soon push several German lenders to build up higher reserves against property loan defaults, in a move that would cut into their profits.】

item.title: 意大利为非洲粮食安全和能源制定七国集团计划
item.description: 意大利正在与七国集团的盟国合作制定支持非洲清洁能源和粮食安全的提案，最快将于下周公布。【原文：Italy is working with Group of Seven allies on proposals to support clean energy and food security in Africa that could be announced as soon as next week.】

item.title: 世界最大选举带来巨大惊喜
item.description: 每天，彭博社记者都会带您走过精选的城镇和城市，为大选投票做准备。【原文：Each day, Bloomberg journalists take you across a selection of towns and cities as they gear up for the big vote.】
